Related repos

  • Minds MCP server connects LLMs to Minds SDK with a standard interface
  • Connects LLMs to NotebookLM via MCP
  • connects all your MCP servers and LLMs in one place
  • Connects LLMs to the web via MCP
  • standard for turning APIs into MCP servers, plus open registry for LLM tools
  • Server for DuckDuckGo search with LLM-friendly output
  • Server for LLMs to send, edit, delete, and search Telegram messages, manage chats, handle media, and more via MCP
